dec2hex

Convert decimal number to base 16.

Syntax

R = dec2hex(D)
R = dec2hex(D, N)

Input argument

D

a non negative integer smaller than the value returned by flintmax.

N

an integer value. number of digits.

Output argument

R

result of dec2hex: char array.

Description

dec2hex converts decimal number to base 16.

Example

Y = dec2hex(12)

See also

dec2base, hex2dec.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
